column4: Hi I was wondering if someone could help me with usb support for virtualbox?
Is anyone talking?
only the non-free virtualbox version has usb support
yes
yes, why
I was wondering if you knew what option you have to select to make sure the subtitles appear after converting?
there is a subtitle check box
there is also the #handbrake channel
There is default, burned in and forced I didn't know which is best to use
#handbrake is your friend on that one, I never use subtitles so don't understand the difference
Ok thanks
Hey I spoke to you before and you were a great help do you find your conversions on handbrake come out at m4v not mp4?
they use the mp4 container but normally have an different extension
What it is I have a samsung lcd tv with a usb media player and I know it plays avi and mp4 but not sure it would play m4v but I wondered if I could get it to convert to mp4 instead?
mp4 container in an m4v extension
I have read it isn't the same as mp4 though just uses the same codec
again, #handbrake is your friend
Sorry only just seen your message I am going to do one chapter and try it on my tv
no problem
Thanks again tho
welcome
